body_html:
@cpuhrsch just confirmed with mkl-dnn team, mkl-dnn doesn't support TBB at the moment, they are looking into supporting it but no ETA. So it's not likely that mkl-dnn can support TBB in a short while.
Data from @MlWoo and @juliusshufan verified that the perf drop is related to TBB and OpenMP competition.

Anyway, i think still we have two things to follow up:

  • figure out if it is possible for TBB and OpenMP thread pool to run peacefully
  • refine CPU benchmarks to track the performance regression

body:
@cpuhrsch  just confirmed with mkl-dnn team, mkl-dnn doesn't support TBB at the moment, they are looking into supporting it but no ETA. So it's not likely that mkl-dnn can support TBB in a short while.
Data from @MlWoo and @juliusshufan verified that the perf drop is related to TBB and OpenMP competition.

Anyway, i think still we have two things to follow up:

- figure out if it is possible for TBB and OpenMP thread pool to run peacefully
- refine CPU benchmarks to track the performance regression
